title: It’s time for tighter regulation of how Facebook and Google use our data
text: Big tech’s power has reached a tipping point. Governments must set some ground rules.

title: Facebook sues two app developers for ad fraud
text: The developers released Android apps to infect people's phones with malware, Facebook alleges.

title: Facebook: Buy The Pullback
text: Stock decline after earnings has made valuation attractive.

title: Facebook sues two app developers for click injection ad fraud
text: Facebook has filed lawsuits against two app developers accused of generating fraudulent revenue using the social media giant’s advertising platform. The company announced the legal action in a blog post Tuesday.

title: Buy Facebook And AMD After Yesterday's Plunge
text: The best time to buy stocks is when they are down for reasons that have little to do with the company. This is one of those times.

title: Facebook's messaging app for kids faces scrutiny from US lawmakers
text: A flaw in Facebook Messenger Kids let children chat with people who hadn't been OK'd by their parents.

title: Facebook's Libra plans are under fire again – this time from global privacy regulators
text: A joint statement signed by top privacy officials from the U.S., EU and U.K.

title: Facebook urged to shut down groups selling fake Amazon reviews
text: Dozens of Facebook groups have been promoting fake Amazon reviews despite a regulator warning the social media company about the practice, the consumer group Which? has said.

title: Facebook still full of groups trading fake reviews, says consumer group
text: Facebook has failed to clean up the brisk trade in fake product reviews taking place on its platform, an investigation by the consumer association Which? has found.

title: Here is When to Buy the Dip in Facebook Stock
text:
Facebook stock will bounce back from this recent sell-off, but things may get worse before they get better.
